file_content.text: Our dropships are bringing additional troops. They'll clear out any stray Imperials, but they need homing beacons to follow.
Our injured have a rendezvous point nearby. Get there and contact me once you've activated the homing beacons.
We're past the zoo and close to Imperial territory now. Scanners have picked up a group of Imperial walkers headed our way.
Do what you can to put those walkers out of commission. You'll be crossing enemy lines to reach them, so stay sharp.
Our troops have reached the Coronet Zoo. They're reporting Imperial snipers firing from inside.
Take out the snipers, but be careful. There's plenty of places at the Coronet Zoo for them to hide.
The trenches are along far enough now. Our long-range artillery camps are under attack, and the troops need help.
Get to those camps, stop the Empire, and make sure the artillery's still functioning.
